2164.subject: WLC
2164.descrlong: This course is offered to students who are non-native speakers of English and who wish to develop advanced academic reading and writing skills. These skills include understanding the structure and conventions of written work in various academic disciplines, analyzing and responding to assigned texts, and making effective choices in writing for specific academic situations. The course will cover strategies for reading, writing, and conducting research at an American university. (Credit/No Credit Available)
